text: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

text: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
author: George Orwell

text: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
author: Richard Branson

text: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

text: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert
